comment: * Track our app name.  We don't (currently) handle any inbound packets.

methods.name: public static void register()
methods.comment: * Register for the messages we're interested in.

methods.name: public void connected()
methods.comment:
* Called when the DDM server connects.  The handler is allowed to
     * send messages to the server.

methods.name: public void disconnected()
methods.comment:
* Called when the DDM server disconnects.  Can be used to disable
     * periodic transmissions or clean up saved state.

methods.name: public static void setAppName(String name, int userId)
methods.comment: * Sets all names to the same name.

methods.name: public static void setAppName(String appName, String pkgName, int userId)
methods.comment:
* Set the application name.  Called when we get named, which may be
     * before or after DDMS connects.  For the latter we need to send up
     * an APNM message.

methods.name: private static void sendAPNM(String appName, String pkgName, int userId)

methodNames: public static void setAppName(String name, int userId)
public static void setAppName(String appName, String pkgName, int userId)
private static void sendAPNM(String appName, String pkgName, int userId)
